  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83259</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83259</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Transmission de la lumière selon l'épaisseur du  polyéthylène</string>
            <string language="en">Light transmission depending on the thickness of polyethylene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Übertragung abhängig von der Stärke des 
Polyäthylens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão clara dependendo da espessura do 
polietileno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione della luce secondo lo spessore di 
polietilene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά μετάδοση ανάλογα με το πάχος του 
πολυαιθυλενίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión ligera dependiendo del espesor del 
polietileno</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme de lignes montre le rapport entre le pourcentage de transmission de la lumière et l'épaisseur du polyéthylène quand la lumière frappe le polyéthylène.</string>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship of percent of light transmission and thickness of polyethylene when light hits polyethylene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">polyéthylène</string>
            <string language="en">polyethylene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">épaisseur</string>
            <string language="en">thickness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">transmission</string>
            <string language="en">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis von 
Prozenten der hellen Übertragung und von Stärke des Polyäthylens, 
wenn Licht Polyäthylen schlägt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento dos 
por cento da transmissão clara e da espessura do polietileno quando a
luz bate o polietileno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto dei 
percento della trasmissione della luce e dello spessore di polietilene
quando la luce colpisce il polietilene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
των τοις εκατό της ελαφριάς μετάδοσης και του πάχους του 
πολυαιθυλενίου πότε το φως χτυπά το πολυαιθυλένιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo de por 
ciento de la transmisión ligera y del espesor del polietileno cuando 
la luz golpea el polietileno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polyäthylen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stärke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polietileno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espessura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">transmissão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">polietilene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spessore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasmissione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολυαιθυλένιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πάχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">polietileno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espesor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transmisión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
